channel.title: Restarter problem?
channel.description:
Ok I have no idea why this is happening. It restarts for hours fine, but every now and then I notice it restarts and no one can connect. I've re opened the auto restart 5 times and turned it back on and still no one can connect.
EDIT: Could it be because I was doing something at the time of the reset? -Nvm happened when I wasn't doing anything.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2009, 04:42:52 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Restarter problem?
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

Ok I have no idea why this is happening. It restarts for hours fine, but every now and then I notice it restarts and no one can connect. I’ve re opened the auto restart 5 times and turned it back on and still no one can connect.

EDIT: Could it be because I was doing something at the time of the reset? -Nvm happened when I wasn’t doing anything.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2009, 04:42:52 pm[/size][hr]anyone?
